sen.j: 藤原 資家（ふじわら の すけいえ、生没年不詳）は、平安時代の人物で、藤原北家道長流の一族。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Sukeie (dates of birth and death unknown) was a person who lived in the Heian period and he belonged to the family of Michinaga's line of the Northern branch of the Fujiwara clan.
FUJIWARA no Sukeie (dates of birth and death unknown) was a person who lived in the Heian period and he belonged to the family of Michinaga's line of the Northern branch of the Fujiwara clan.
FUJIWARA no Sukeie (year of birth and death unknown) was a person who lived in the Heian period and he belonged to the family of Michinaga's line of the Northern branch of the Fujiwara clan.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに従い、year of birth and death unknownとしました。

sen.e: He was the founder of Nasu clan.
He was the founder of Nasu clan.
He was the founder of Nasu clan.
His father was FUJIWARA no Michiie, Shimotsuke no kami (the governor of the Shimotsuke Province).
His father was FUJIWARA no Michiie, Shimotsuke no kami (the governor of the Shimotsuke Province).
His father was FUJIWARA no Michiie, Shimotsuke no kami (the governor of the Shimotsuke Province).

sen.j: 母は河内守源頼信の娘。
sen.e: Mother was the daughter of MINAMOTO no Yorinobu, Kawachi no kami (the governor of the Kawachi Province).
His mother was the daughter of MINAMOTO no Yorinobu, Kawachi no kami (the governor of the Kawachi Province).
His mother was the daughter of MINAMOTO no Yorinobu, Kawachi no kami (the governor of the Kawachi Province).

sen.j: 藤原道長の曾孫であると共に、歌人として著名な藤原長家の孫。
sen.e: He was the great grandchild of FUJIWARA no Michinaga and was the grandchild of FUJIWARA no Nagaie, a well-known poet.
He was a great grandchild of FUJIWARA no Michinaga and was a grandchild of FUJIWARA no Nagaie, a well-known poet.
sen.cmt: 定冠詞を不定冠詞に変更しました。
sen.e: He was a great grandchild of FUJIWARA no Michinaga and was a grandchild of FUJIWARA no Nagaie, a well-known poet.

sen.j: 奥州白河郡八溝山の賊を討った功により、下野国那須郡を賜り、同地に下向。
sen.e: He was granted Nasu county in the Shimotsuke Province (present Tochigi Prefecture) as a reward when he defeated the rebel in Mt. Yamizo in Shirakawa County, Oshu (Mutsu Province); accordingly he left the capital and went to Nasu county.

He was granted the Nasu county in the Shimotsuke Province (present Tochigi Prefecture) as a reward when he defeated the rebels in Mt. Yamizo in the Shirakawa county, Oshu (Mutsu Province); accordingly he left the capital and went to the Nasu county.

He was granted the Nasu county in the Shimotsuke Province (present Tochigi Prefecture) as a reward when he defeated the rebels in Mt. Yamizo in the Shirakawa county, Oshu (Mutsu Province); accordingly he left the capital and went to the Nasu county.

sen.j: 須藤権守貞信と称し、神田城を築城。
sen.e: He called himself as Sudo gon no kami Tadanobu and built Kanda Castle in Nasu county.
He called himself Sudo gon no kami Tadanobu and built the Kanda Castle in the Nasu county.
sen.cmt: 定冠詞を追加しました。
sen.e: He called himself Sudo gon no kami Tadanobu and built the Kanda Castle in the Nasu county.
Afterward his family lived in Nasu county generation to generation.
Afterward his family lived in the Nasu county generation to generation.
sen.cmt: 定冠詞を追加しました。
sen.e: Afterward his family lived in the Nasu county generation to generation.
